actions.name: OnDiscordMessage
actions.description: A even triggered by the reception of a direct message

returns.name: MESSAGE
returns.description: The body of the received message

returns.name: AUTHOR_ID
returns.description: The Discord ID of the message's author

returns.name: AUTHOR_NAME
returns.description: The Discord username of the message's author

actions.name: OnDiscordMessageFrom
actions.description: A even triggered by the reception of a direct message from a specified user

params.name: user_id
params.description: The Discord ID of the sender

returns.name: MESSAGE
returns.description: The body of the received message

returns.name: AUTHOR_ID
returns.description: The Discord ID of the message's author

returns.name: AUTHOR_NAME
returns.description: The Discord username of the message's author

actions.name: OnDiscordMention
actions.description: A even triggered when the authenticated user is mentioned

returns.name: MESSAGE
returns.description: The body of the received message

returns.name: AUTHOR_ID
returns.description: The Discord ID of the message's author

returns.name: AUTHOR_NAME
returns.description: The Discord username of the message's author

actions.name: OnNewDiscordGuildMember
actions.description: A even triggered when a new member joins a guild

returns.name: NEW_MEMBER_ID
returns.description: The Discord ID of the new member

returns.name: NEW_MEMBER_NAME
returns.description: The Discord Username of the new member

returns.name: SERVER_ID
returns.description: The Discord ID of the guild

actions.name: OnDiscordGuildLeave
actions.description: A even triggered when a member leaves a guild

returns.name: NEW_MEMBER_ID
returns.description: The Discord ID of the new member

returns.name: NEW_MEMBER_NAME
returns.description: The Discord Username of the new member

returns.name: SERVER_ID
returns.description: The Discord ID of the guild
